what: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: spec-driven data validation platform designed clinical trial datasets. Built help study leads automatically detect, track, resolve data issues across multiple raw data transfers. Modular, extensible, ready deployment.

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: âœ… Spec-Driven Configuration: Study leads define logic via Excel spec fileâ€”coding required. ğŸ” Automated Checkpoints: Predefined custom checks run across raw datasets. ğŸ“Š Excel Output: Issues logged structured Excel tabs status tracking. ğŸ” Multi-Run Support: Handles repeated raw data transfers versioned issue logs. ğŸ§  Modular Architecture: Easily extendable new studies without changing core logic. ğŸ–¥ï¸ Optional Shiny UI: non-technical users run checks view results interactively.

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
code: install.packages(c(   "dplyr", "openxlsx", "haven",    "purrr", "stringr", "readxl" ))

what: 3. Prepare your spec and raw data
title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: Use spec_template.xlsx starting point. Place raw.sas7bdat files designated data folder.

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: ReadMe: Overview run parameter settings Issue Log: Cumulative issue tracking table Dataset Tabs: Detailed issue records dataset Add screenshots demo video links illustrate output.

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: Configuration Code: study-specific logic resides spec file. Modular Design: function independently testable reusable. User-Centric: Study leads can run checks without writing code. Scalability: Supports versioned runs, state tracking, new studies minimal changes.

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: Migrate core logic Python (pandas + openpyxl). Replace Excel-based issue tracking SQLite. Integrate Airflow DAG scheduled runs. Deploy Shiny UI RStudio Connect Posit Workbench. Package toolkit R library (kiacTracker).

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: Shushun Ren Statistical programmer / Biostatistician / Data Engineer Â· OMSCS Candidate ğŸ”— LinkedIn ğŸ“§ shushunr@umich.edu

what: Preprocess raw datasets according to spec â€” preprocess
title: Preprocess raw datasets according to spec â€” preprocess
text: function standardizes subject site identifiers, applies preprocessing rules defined spec, captures visit-related metadata dataset pool. main steps include: Identify subject site variables create unified columns SUBJECT_ID SITEID. Apply row- column-level filtering rules spec (sheet "PREPROCESSING"). Detect visit-related columns (visit date visit label). Return updated datasets summary data frame metadata.

title: Preprocess raw datasets according to spec â€” preprocess
code: preprocess(datasets_pool, spec_path, export_to_env = FALSE)

title: Preprocess raw datasets according to spec â€” preprocess
text: datasets_pool named list raw datasets, typically output load_dataset(). spec_path File path preprocessing spec (Excel, sheet "PREPROCESSING").

title: Preprocess raw datasets according to spec â€” preprocess
text: list two elements: visit_info_df data frame one row per dataset, containing subject/site variable names detected visit columns. datasets_pool updated datasets preprocessing.
